head.title: . . . And Holders Of Crystal To Put Them In

hedline.hl1: . . . And Holders Of Crystal To Put Them In

abstract.p: Comment on crystal candleholders from Herve Baume in Avignon, France (Currents); photo (S)

block.p: Crystal candleholders from Herve Baume are a must-have for elegant houses in Provence (left, Photophore a Piedouche 3, hand-blown crystal, 11 1/2 inches high, $110). ''Simple in design, noble in material,'' said Mr. Baume, an antiques dealer and designer of garden furniture and accessories. He left Paris for Avignon 25 years ago to turn his refined eye on Provencal style. His Web site, www.herve-baume.com, will be ready in November. Until then, fax (011) 33-4-90-27-05-97 for a beautiful catalog, $25 (the price will be deducted from the first purchase); Herve Baume, 19 ter, rue Petite Fusterie, Avignon; (011) 33-4-90-86-37-66
